de.ovgu.wdok.guinan

Class GuinanMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.wdok.guinan.GuinanMaster

  • @Singleton
public class GuinanMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    GuinanMaster is part of the Guinan Webservice.
    It accepts queries sent via HTTP GET to the query endpoint (something like http://host.com/GuinanMaster/query/<querystring>). It then forwards the query to each of the connectors in the registered_connectors list and collects their results. The result set is returned as JSON to the original caller.

    Using the @singleton annotation, since we want only one instance of the service per request to be able to keep the list of connectors see http://jersey.java.net/nonav/apidocs/1.12/jersey/com/sun/jersey/spi/resource /Singleton.html
    Version:
    0.6
    Author:
    Katrin Krieger

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerConnector(java.lang.String new_connector,
                                          java.lang.String req)
        via HTTP POST .../register/ a connector can register to the GuinanMaster The connector is then added to the list of currently registered connectors
        Parameters:
        new_connector - connector's unique name
        req - connector's URI endpoint
        Returns:
        Response containing status code of success or fail

      • query

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response query(java.lang.String query)
        The query method is called, when the client makes a HTTP GET request to the query endpoint (something like http://host.com/GuinanMaster/query/<querystring>). It then forwards the query to the registered endpoints and collects their responses in order to send it back to the calling client.
        Parameters:
        query - query string to be passed to connectors
        Returns:
        Response to client containing set of result objects (as JSON)
